title: Virtual Reality-Based Constructivist Collaborative Language Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary foreign language proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners access VR environments via personal mobile devices, acquiring the target language through interactions with non-player characters (NPCs) and collaborative activities with peers. Formative assessments provide continuous feedback.

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or higher communication success rates with non-player characters in virtual reality environments.
Through collaborative learning, 90% or more of learners complete role-playing scenario performances tailored to specific contexts.
Learners complete 75% or more of weekly microlearning modules and perform virtual object tagging activities in the target language.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
